name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
What a World 3 Reading/ Listening
Week	1	Orientation
Week	2-3	Unit 1: Who is the Most Important Person from History?/	Unit 1: What are Some Different Types of Inventions?
Week	4-5	Unit 2: What are Fattening Rooms?/	Unit 2: What is Beauty around the World?
Week	6-7	Unit 3: Where can You Find a Living Goddess?/	Unit 3: What Countries have Royalty Today?
Week	8	Review Units 1, 2, 3
Week	9	Midterm
Week	10-11	Unit 4: What is a Knight?/	Unit 4: What are Some Rites of Passage?
Week	12-13	Unit 5: Who Reached the South Pole First?/	Unit 5: Who are Some Famous Explorers?
Week	14-15	Unit 7: What did the Ancient Egyptians Give Us?/	Unit 7: What have the Chinese Given the World?
Week	16	Review Units 4, 5, 7
Week	17	Term Review
Week	18	Final
scorePolicy:
期中考_聽力與口說 	30%  
期末考_筆試  		30%  	
平時成績			40%
materials:
What a World 3 Reading
What a World 3 Listening
